short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AssistNow is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your ServiceNow experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AssistNow is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your ServiceNow experience. With AssistNow, you can quickly search table records, log your timesheets effortlessly, and maintain a favorites page for easy access to frequently used items. Additionally, it offers a quick responses feature that lets you paste pre-saved responses into any input field with a simple right-click. Simply set up your ServiceNow domain, username, and password, and you'll have instant access to your ServiceNow instance, all within your browser. You can view the docs at https://assistnowsn.com/
